data.name: Humanities Legend: Dark Horizon
data.detailed_description:
-Explore a segmented open world and clear out the dark by defeating enemies, bosses, or destroying galls.

-Find and collect treasure and coin felt behind in the war, then use it to buy armor or level up.

-Enter caves and dungeons, explore its depths, then defeat the boss at the end.

-Learn new magic abilities, powerful attacks that consume MP and stun enemies.

-Clear enough of the dark from the area to fight the Area Boss, then defeat it to unlock the next segment of the world.

-A dynamic time of day and weather system.

This game is currently in Alpha, subject to changes.

Demo coming soon, 2022!

data.short_description: A segmented open world action-adventure game. Fight bosses, explore dungeons, and find magic abilities to push out the Dark form the land. Collect and level up to fight stronger enemies.
